scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Flagellation of Christ. Christ, with a halo and bound, stands in the center, his body marked with wounds. To his left, a figure in a red tunic and tan hose holds a whip. To his right, another figure, wearing a blue head covering and a brown tunic with red hose, raises a club to strike Christ. The background features a blue wall and an arched, vaulted ceiling, suggesting an interior architectural setting. The ground is tiled in green.
